title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.

Steps to reproduce:
1. [Please provide the steps to reproduce the issue.]
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the item doesn't get selected.
EB: The second time I select the same item, it can be selected successfully.
SR: [Please provide a solution or steps to resolve the issue.]
